title: #49: Adult Breakup (Jayson Thibault, Steve Rannazzisi, Ari Shaffir)
itunes:title: Adult Breakup with Jayson Thibault and Steve Rannazzisi
description: Jayson Thibault, Steve Rannazzisi and I sat in one of the back rooms of the Comedy Store and talked about Jayson's recent breakup. It's not sappy at all, so don't worry about that. We just covered what it feels like and what you have to do to be a mature adult in a breakup and if Steve gets boners on shoots.
